ComicInfo.Title: The Man On the Moon; Tales of ZvR: A Howl of Wind!
ComicInfo.Summary:
“The Man on the Moon!” A special full-length, standalone tale exploring different visions of the ZvR war as well as the origin of our mystery figure from above!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Mark Torres | 1-2 | Sub | EC Comics Cover Month Variant Cover | Mark Torres | 3-4 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-06 18:30:16. [CVDB493825]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Ashley Wood, James "Brad Mick" McDonough, James Kochalka, Paul Davidson, Valentin Ramon
ComicInfo.Inker: Ashley Wood, James "Brad Mick" McDonough, James Kochalka, Paul Davidson, Valentin Ramon
